1.0.name: wordpress/spyr-bar
1.0.description:
Easily link together your network of sites with the (SPYR) Network Bar.

This plugin was born out of the necessity to interlink our Spyr Media network. It was originally meant to be an in-house project, but once it was developed we figured everyone should benefit. So have at it!

You can see the plugin in action on some of our sites:

  • (in)SPYR Theme
  • Marla's Paleo Porn
